title: French rail unions take on Macron's reforms
text:
French rail unions take on Macron's reforms 10:05pm IST - 01:59 
French railway services were thrown into chaos on Tuesday, the first day of rolling nationwide strikes that are set to run for months in the toughest test yet of President Emmanuel Macron's determination to modernize the French economy. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
